Class CloseChecker

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.compactions.CloseChecker

    • isSizeLimit

      public boolean isSizeLimit(Store store, long bytesWritten)
      Check periodically to see if a system stop is requested every written bytes reach size limit.
      Returns:
      if true, system stop.

      Returns:
      if true, system stop.
